mapper.insert: INSERT INTO green_point (member_id, item_id, amount) VALUES (#{memberId}, NULL, #{amount})
mapper.select: SELECT id, member_id, item_id, amount, CAST(created_at AS TIMESTAMP) AS createdAt FROM GREEN_POINT WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY created_at DESC OFFSET #{page} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
